TopicTitle: Filling Command Chairs at Design Time

Articles.Content:
Was tinkering with this last night and noticed I could put a Kerbal classified as a Tourist in a command chair. 

Then deployed the craft and not only was the Tourist able to drive around in the rover.  They were able to leave their chair too...

Was the first time we had tourists out walking around the KSC. 

If command chairs now also follow transfer rules (which I just thought of, so not tested) I could...  possiblly... transfer stranded tourists to command chairs in order to liberate them from certain precarious death traps, and just let em walk around at will.

Edited October 18, 2018 by XLjedi

Hmmmm..... definitely a bug, not a feature, as per the intended usage of tourists, but.....   I wonder if this a bug they'll choose to 'fix', since it does add some gameplay to the game.    It will have to be pretty intentional then for your tourists to get into much trouble...

Alright so after a little testing...  in my sandbox mode it looks like the command chairs do NOT follow transfer rules.   Which as I think about it, makes logical sense since they never followed transfer rules before.  

But I can transfer a tourist to a cockpit and then choose to eva and walk around.  Has it always been this way and I just never noticed?

Tourists should not be able to go EVA ever.

There's a mod, 'Take Command' which allows assigning kerbals to command chairs on launch or transferring them to it.

AFAIK in stock you'll never see a tourist outside a pressurized vessel.

Just now, Sharpy said:

Tourists should not be able to go EVA ever.

There's a mod, 'Take Command' which allows assigning kerbals to command chairs on launch or transferring them to it.

AFAIK in stock you'll never see a tourist outside a pressurized vessel.

Just go into the SPH... 

Press Ctrl-Alt-F12 for the debug widow...

Create a Kerbal classified as a "Tourist"

Add the Tourist to your craft and presto!  You get a Tourist wandering around the KSC.

Maybe its just a Sandbox thing?

@Rocket In My Pocket  Regardless of the Command Chair...  I can put a Tourist that I create in the Debug Dialog into any cockpit or crew container and they can go EVA.  Just not sure if it's always been that way?  Never really tested it prior to this command chair mod release.
TBH, Surface EVA should totally be a thing for tourist kerbals, but without RCS.  I consider orbital EVA a tad to complicated for Tourists, but walking over another planets surface should be in it.
